attributes.action: Introduce compulsory mental health training to employers and educators.
attributes.additional_details:
It wasn't until recently that I began to get help for my crippling mental health. 

I have hit every obstacle trying to get help and I believe this is down to the lack of understanding that employers and educators have. The NHS is stretched, so I believe that we need to meet the problem sooner.

I want to set up this campaign and see it through, as every day without such channels in place, is another day where lives are lost because of a stretched health service and lack of outsider knowledge.
attributes.background:
Hi, my name is Daniel Coole, and I am a U.K mental health blogger. 
I have long suffered depression and anxiety.
I believe that all educators and employers need to be given compulsory training on dealing with mental health, from recognising the signs to putting help and appropriate plans in place.
